articles.title: About this blog
articles.contents:
I started learning programming because I was interested in automating
some tasks at work. I really found it fun since I love messing with data
and turning it around to make it ‚Äúspeak‚Äù (I was already a huge fan of
excel pivot tables). The more I learn about data science the more I like
it.
I am a problem solver, looking for an opportunity to demonstrate my
skills with a team of highly motivated and talented professionals, with
a start up spirit, and help contribute to the development of
technology.
You can find more about how I created this portfolio in the blog post I created about
it.

            Eric Narro
          
          
            
              I am a data analyst currently looking for new
              opportunities, after 8 years in the wine industry I
              developed code-based solutions and fell in love with
              python and programming. I live in France but I am able to
              move anywhere around the üåé. I love working with data,
              sorting it, turning it around, creating üìà, and making it
              speak. I also enjoy cooking, hiking, travelling and
              gardening. Please, check up my portfolio and my work, and
              feel free to contact me for more information! Thanks for
              taking the time to read about me.
